localResource.name: Data_Centers
localResource.label: Data_Centers
localResource.queryString: SELECT DISTINCT o.historyId as historyId, o.datacenterId as datacenterId, CASE WHEN o.deleteDate IS NULL THEN datacenterName ELSE (datacenterName || ' (Removed on ' || cast(deleteDate as string) || ')') END as datacenterNameIc, o.deleteDate as deleteDate FROM V23DatacenterConfigurationView as o WHERE o.historyId = (SELECT max(a.historyId) FROM V23DatacenterConfigurationView as a WHERE a.datacenterId = o.datacenterId) and o.datacenterId in (SELECT DISTINCT d.id.datacenterId FROM V23DatacenterStorageDomainMapView as d WHERE ((YEAR(d.detachDate) <= YEAR($P{P_End_Date}) and MONTH(d.detachDate) <= MONTH($P{P_End_Date}) and DAY(d.detachDate) <= DAY($P{P_End_Date})) OR d.detachDate IS NULL) AND (YEAR(d.id.attachDate) >= YEAR($P{P_Start_Date}) and MONTH(d.id.attachDate) >= MONTH($P{P_Start_Date}) and DAY(d.id.attachDate) >= DAY($P{P_Start_Date}))) order by o.deleteDate DESC
